info.headline: Tornado Warning issued March 07 at 2:25AM CST until March 07 at 2:45AM CST by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 245 AM CST FOR NORTHWESTERN DESHA AND EASTERN LINCOLN COUNTIES... At 224 AM CST, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located over Mills, or 7 miles northwest of Dumas, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. Locations impacted include... Dumas... Gould... Mitchellville... Douglas... Mills... Garrett Bridge... Pendleton... Varner... Pickens in Desha County... Avery... Reedville... TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris. Tornadoes are extremely difficult to see and confirm at night. Do not wait to see or hear the tornado. TAKE COVER NOW!
